--- layout: datasheet title: TrafficGuard Probe Instrument ---

Traffic Guard Probe is the lower level network probe that delivers identities to TrafficGuard Manager. Probes can be deployed to multiple networks and they are controlled by single TrafficGuard Manager.

Properties

Developer F-Solutions Oy
Categories Integrity Monitoring, Asset Tracking
Network access type Passive
Required interfaces Monitored network. (mirror-bridge with receive capabilities)
Dependencies TrafficGuard Management
Data retention TrafficGuard Probe does not store data locally.
Management UI No
Performance None
